text: Is there any way to change the links in `Documenter.jl` to include the `index.html` so that it works without a webserver?

elements.text: Is there any way to change the links in
so that it works without a webserver?

text: Alternatively, how easy would it be to write a webserver in a julia script I could distribute with my project that people could view it in a browser?
